title: Best app to know accurate air quality
review: Great app, informs about air quality and provides suggestions. The bigger the community gets with more sensors in place all uploading to this site, the more accurate the information would be.

title: Super useful
review: If you like to do outdoors sports its good to check when it is the least harmful if you live around polluted areas, or we experience a lot of dust in the air from the desert, it is important to know what we breathe is not just air.

title: Informative Health Information
review: While we all know the quality of the air that we breath is tremendously important to our health, I had no idea until I discovered this app how deceptive appearances can be... I don’t leave home without checking this app and it’s positively improved the quality of me and my family’s life.

title: Need to know more locations in a city
review: I’m using this app in Afghanistan, it is showing only one location in Kabul city, it will be better to estimate the pollution for different locations in Kabul City not only the center of city, thanks.

title: Make it more user friendly
review: Make it easier to delete or to keep the locations we need or don't need.

title: Make it dark mode in widget and interface
review: Dear developers you guys made wonderful essential app, only one request please do dark mode support in widgets and UI

title: Very helpful
review: This app provides the best information on air quality, enjoyed using it so far.

title: Very informative
review: Good to know the air quality of where you are especially if you suffer from allergies.

title: Awesome!
review: Excellent App. Tells you all the information hidden to our eyes required for a healthy living.

title: Great app
review: Sometimes some stations wont update for half a day, but otherwise mostly accurate in its predictions and comfortable to use. Great app

title: Extremely informative
review: Great app that allows to monitor air quality in real time.

title: A must to prevent respiratory problems
review: I strongly believed it helped us prevent our daughter’s asthma crisis to occur more often.

title: Thank you
review: You are really saving our life

title: Very useful & efficient App
review: Great App with great service.... helps me plan outdoor activities to stay healthy...

title: Air Quality
review:
Practical every day useful app to make informed  decisions about the air I breathe.
Great App! 🙌🏻🙂
